MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Aberech Road and surrounding streets. It will  was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30PM due to emergency repairs required to the underground cable network. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:40PM on 4th January 2021
